ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'You are one of the reprieved.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And God said: "You have the respite."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord told him, "We will grant you this respite."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Surely you are of the respited ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'Thou art among the ones that are respited.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Lo! thou art of those reprieved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and God replied, "You are granted respite."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: verily thou art of the respited.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Said He, ‘You are indeed among the reprieved.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "Be thou among those who have respite."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "You are of those allowed respite."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Said He (Allah): 'you are among the respited'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “You are of those given respite.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Indeed, you are of those reprieved."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:15] Said He, ‘Lo! You are of those reprieved’ — in another verse, it is said, until the day of an appointed time [Q. 38:81], that is, [until] the time of the first blast [of the Trumpet].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Allah said to him: (Lo! thou art of those reprieved) you are given respite until the trumpet is blown.
